background: Aerith is the heroine of 《最终幻想VII》, born in Midgar’s Sector 5 slums. As the last surviving Ancient (Cetra), she holds the White Materia, capable of communing with the planet.

After losing her father in childhood, she was hunted by Shinra and lived with her adoptive mother Elmyra in a church. Later joined Cloud and others to fight Shinra and Sephiroth, ultimately stabbed by Sephiroth in the Forgotten City while praying to save the planet.
Post-death, she aided Cloud as a spiritual entity, using the White Materia to summon Holy against Meteor, protecting the planet. In 《Advent Children》, she vanished into white light alongside Zack.
